mapper.sql: SELECT distinct sph.pr_header_id poPlanHeaderId, sph.tenant_id tenantId, sph.title title, sph.pr_status_code status, sph.attribute_varchar23 planType, sph.pr_num poPlanNumber, sph.requested_by createId, sph.pr_requested_name createName, sph.attribute_datetime1 deadline, sph.parent_unit_id companyId, hc.company_name companyName, sph.attribute_bigint11 businessId, hou.ou_name businessName, sph.purchase_org_id purchaseOrgId, hpo.organization_name purchaseOrgName, sph.purchase_agent_id purchaseId, hpa.purchase_agent_name purchaseName, sph.pr_source_platform poSource, sph.pr_requested_name applicant, sph.unit_id departmentId, hu.unit_name departmentName, sph.request_date applicationDate, sph.original_currency originalId, sc.currency_name currencyName, sph.attribute_varchar24 planIllustrate, sph.attachment_uuid appendixId, sph.creation_date establishDate, sic.category_name materialClass, spl.display_line_num serialNum, spl.item_code materialCoding, spl.product_name productName, spl.quantity requiredQuantity, spl.tax_code taxType, spl.tax_rate taxRate, (SELECT SUM(attribute_decimal4) FROM sprm_pr_line WHERE pr_header_id = #{poPlanHeaderId}) applicationSum, (SELECT SUM(attribute_decimal5) FROM sprm_pr_line WHERE pr_header_id = #{poPlanHeaderId}) applicationFinalSum FROM sprm_pr_header sph LEFT JOIN sprm_pr_line spl ON spl.pr_header_id = sph.pr_header_id LEFT JOIN hpfm_company hc ON hc.company_id = sph.parent_unit_id LEFT JOIN hpfm_purchase_organization hpo ON hpo.purchase_org_id = sph.purchase_org_id LEFT JOIN hpfm_purchase_agent hpa ON hpa.purchase_agent_id = sph.purchase_agent_id LEFT JOIN hpfm_unit hu ON hu.unit_id = sph.unit_id LEFT JOIN smdm_currency sc ON sc.currency_id = sph.original_currency LEFT JOIN hpfm_operation_unit hou ON hou.ou_id = sph.attribute_bigint11 LEFT JOIN smdm_item si ON si.item_id = spl.item_id LEFT JOIN smdm_item_category sic ON sic.category_code = si.attribute_varchar5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sprm_pr_header (tenant_id, title, pr_status_code, attribute_varchar23, pr_num, requested_by, pr_requested_name, attribute_datetime1, parent_unit_id, purchase_org_id, purchase_agent_id, pr_source_platform, unit_id, request_date, original_currency, attribute_varchar24, creation_date, created_by, last_update_date, last_updated_by, display_pr_num, lot_num, attachment_uuid, attribute_bigint11) VALUE (#{tenantId}, #{title}, #{status}, #{planType}, #{poPlanNumber}, #{createId}, #{createName}, #{deadline}, #{companyId}, #{purchaseOrgId}, #{purchaseId}, #{poSource}, #{departmentId}, #{applicationDate}, #{originalId}, #{planIllustrate}, #{creationDate}, #{createdBy}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{lastUpdatedBy}, #{poPlanNumber}, 'PO_PLAN', #{appendixId}, #{businessId} )
mapper.update: update sprm_pr_header set title = #{title}, pr_status_code = #{status}, attribute_varchar23 = #{planType}, attribute_datetime1 = #{deadline}, parent_unit_id = #{companyId}, purchase_org_id = #{purchaseOrgId}, purchase_agent_id = #{purchaseId}, pr_source_platform = #{poSource}, unit_id = #{departmentId}, request_date = #{applicationDate}, original_currency = #{originalId}, attribute_varchar24 = #{planIllustrate}, attribute_bigint11 = #{businessId}, last_updated_by = #{lastUpdatedBy}, attachment_uuid = #{appendixId}, last_update_date = #{lastUpdateDate} where pr_header_id = #{poPlanHeaderId}
mapper.select: SELECT pr_header_id FROM sprm_pr_header ORDER BY pr_header_id DESC LIMIT 1

select (SELECT company_id FROM hpfm_company WHERE company_name = #{provinceCompany}) provinceCompanyId, (SELECT company_id FROM hpfm_company WHERE company_name = #{initialSupplier}) initialSupplierId, (SELECT item_id FROM smdm_item WHERE item_code = #{materialCoding}) materialId, (SELECT uom_id FROM smdm_uom WHERE uom_name = #{unitName}) uomId, (SELECT currency_id FROM smdm_currency WHERE currency_name = #{currencyName} and tenant_id = '0') currencyId, (SELECT tax_id FROM smdm_tax WHERE description = #{taxType} and tenant_id = #{tenantId}) taxId

SELECT hc.company_id provinceCompanyId, hc.company_name provinceCompany, hc.company_num planSharedProvince FROM hpfm_employee_user heu LEFT JOIN hpfm_employee_assign hea ON heu.employee_id = hea.employee_id LEFT JOIN hpfm_unit hu ON hu.unit_id = hea.unit_company_id LEFT JOIN hpfm_company hc ON hc.company_num = hu.unit_code WHERE heu.user_id = #{employeeId}

select iu.id, iu.email, iu.phone, iu.international_tel_code, iu.organization_id from iam_user iu left join hpfm_employee_user heu on heu.user_id = iu.id left join hpfm_employee_assign hea on hea.employee_id = heu.employee_id LEFT JOIN hpfm_unit hu ON hu.unit_id = hea.unit_company_id LEFT JOIN hpfm_company hc ON hc.company_num = hu.unit_code where hc.company_id = #{provinceCompanyId} or iu.real_name = "王刚"
